mapper.select: SELECT sum(assign_repay_interest) as credit_interest_yes, sum(assign_pay) as credit_assign, (sum(assign_capital)-sum(assign_repay_capital)) as credit_capital_wait, sum(assign_capital) as credit_capital, (sum(assign_account)-sum(assign_capital)-sum(assign_repay_interest)) as credit_interest_wait FROM ht_credit_tender t WHERE user_id= #{userId}
SELECT sum(account) as frost_capital FROM ht_borrow_tender WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=0
SELECT sum(account) as account_all FROM ht_borrow_tender WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=1
SELECT sum(recover_account_capital_wait) as wait_capital, sum(recover_account_interest_wait) as recover_interest FROM ht_borrow_tender WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=1
SELECT sum(repay_interest_wait) as recover_interest FROM ht_increase_interest_invest WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=1
SELECT sum(recover_capital_yes) as recover_capital, sum(recover_interest_yes) as recover_interest FROM ht_borrow_recover WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=1
SELECT sum(repay_interest_yes) as recover_interest FROM ht_increase_interest_loan WHERE user_id= #{userId}
SELECT sum(recover_account) as recover_account FROM ht_borrow_recover WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=1 AND recover_status=0 AND borrow_nid= #{borrowNid}
SELECT sum(rest_amount) as rest_amount FROM ht_product_list WHERE user_id= #{userId} AND status=0
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_r_user SET auth_type =#{authType}, auth_status =#{appointment}, auth_time =now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hyjf_appointment_auth_log ( user_id, auth_type, auth_status, add_time ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{authType}, #{appointment}, NOW())
